Title: Episode 7
Plot: Rosamund shows up at Downton following Edith's surprise departure. Rose is pleased to introduce Atticus and his parents to everyone. Anna and Bates think about a fresh start, now that that their problems seem to be behind them. Molesley is worried after Daisy becoming disillusioned with her studies. Mary and Blake seize a chance to send Gillingham a strong message.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
